/messages/ProjectBundle.properties.libraries.node.text.project:
库包含可以添加各种功能到您的应用程序的类. 库还包括可以帮助您开发项目的源文件和JavaDocs.

IntelliJ IDEA使用库来帮助您完成代码编译,验证,错误高亮等.

项目库通过整个项目进行引用,可以从所有模块中使用. 此外,您也可以与大家共享该项目.

展开节点并选择子项以管理项目库.

要将库附加到模块,请选择该模块,单击"依赖关系"选项卡，单击"添加"并指定库位置.

/messages/ProjectBundle.properties.project.roots.jdks.node.text:
JDK stands for the Java Development Kit, a software development package that is required to write, test and debug Java applications. JDK also contains classes and runtime environment that are used to execute the target application.

Mobile SDK contains emulator of mobile phone as well as embedded Java SDK to compile/pack/run/debug J2ME applications.

IntelliJ IDEA Plugin SDK contains idea's libraries and idea's embedded JRE to compile/pack/run/debug plugins for Intellij IDEA.

When you create a J2ME Module or Plugin Module, make sure that you have configured appropriate JDK for such a module.

库包含可以添加各种功能到您的应用程序的类. 库还包括可以帮助您开发项目的源文件和JavaDocs.

IntelliJ IDEA使用库来帮助您完成代码编译,验证,错误高亮等.

全局库通过整个项目进行引用,可以从所有模块中使用. 此外,它们可用于在您的计算机上本地创建的所有项目.

请注意,任何与您共享项目的人都不可以使用全局库. 如果您与团队共享项目,请改用项目库.

展开节点并选择子项以管理全局库.

/messages/CodeInsightBundle.properties.inlay.hints.blacklist.pattern.explanatio:
No in-line parameter name hints will be shown for methods matching any of these patterns.
Patterns are matched on fully qualified method name, parameter count and parameter names.
  • java.lang matches all methods from java.lang package
  • java.lang.*(*, *) matches all methods from the java.lang package with two parameters
  • (*info) matches all single parameter methods where the parameter name ends with info
  • (key, value) matches all methods with parameters key and value
  • *.put(key, value) matches all put methods with key and value parameters
